### Trends - Abundance
`r insert_caption('deep-seafloor_green-sturgeon.html', 'Trends - Abundance')`

Green sturgeon, which are listed as Threatened under the Endangered Species Act, are known to utilize the Olympic Coast during portions of their life cycle. A new 5-year review of their status by NOAA Fisheries was initiated on 12/30/2021. https://www.fisheries.noaa.gov/action/initiation-5-year-reviews-eulachon-yelloweye-rockfish-bocaccio-and-green-sturgeon
